support.title: Support
support.subtitle: Help and information about SlopeSafe
support.aboutText: SlopeSafe provides real-time avalanche danger information for Swiss ski resorts. Our data comes from the WSL Institute for Snow and Avalanche Research SLF and is regularly updated. With SlopeSafe, you can view the current danger level, weather forecasts, and historical data for every ski resort in Switzerland.
support.faq1Answer: SlopeSafe is an app that displays current avalanche danger levels for Swiss ski resorts. It offers an interactive map, detailed information for each resort, and weather forecasts.
support.faq2Question: Where does the data come from?
support.faq2Answer: Avalanche data is sourced from the WSL Institute for Snow and Avalanche Research SLF. Weather data comes from OpenWeatherMap.
support.faq3Question: How often is the data updated?
support.faq3Answer: Avalanche data is automatically synchronized every 30 minutes. Weather data is updated with each request.
support.faq4Answer: Yes, SlopeSafe is available for free. All core features such as danger levels, the map, and weather forecasts are available to you without any restrictions.
support.faq5Question: How can I save a ski resort as a favorite?
support.faq5Answer: Create a free account and sign in. Then you can tap the heart icon on a resort's detail page to save it as a favorite.
support.faq6Question: How can I enable push notifications?
support.faq6Answer: After signing in, you can enable push notifications in your profile. You will then be notified when the danger level changes for your favorite resorts.
support.contactText: Do you have questions, suggestions, or issues? Feel free to contact us by email.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.overviewText: Protecting your personal data is important to us. This privacy policy informs you about what data we collect, how we use it, and what rights you have.
privacy.dataCollectionText: When using SlopeSafe, the following data may be collected:
privacy.dataItem1: Account information (name, email address) upon registration
privacy.dataItem3: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
privacy.dataItem4: Location data (only when actively shared, for distance calculation)
privacy.legalBasisText: Your data is processed on the following legal grounds:
privacy.legalBasisItem1: Performance of contract (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR) – for providing your account and favorites
privacy.legalBasisItem2: Consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR) – for location data and push notifications
privacy.legalBasisItem3: Legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR) – for the secure and stable operation of the application and server logs
privacy.purposeText: We use your data exclusively for the following purposes:
privacy.purposeItem2: Managing your user account and favorites
privacy.storageText: We store your data only as long as necessary for the respective purpose:
privacy.storageItem1: Account data – until deletion of your account
privacy.storageItem2: Server logs and IP addresses – maximum 30 days
privacy.storageItem3: Favorites – until removed by you or deletion of your account
privacy.hostingText: SlopeSafe is hosted on servers in the European Union (Germany). Your data does not leave the EU. No transfer to third countries takes place.
privacy.thirdPartyText: We use the following external services. All API requests are made through our backend – your IP address is not forwarded to these services:
privacy.thirdPartySLF: Avalanche data from the WSL Institute for Snow and Avalanche Research (no personal data transmitted)
privacy.thirdPartyWeather: Weather data from OpenWeatherMap (no personal data transmitted)
privacy.securityText: We protect your data through the following technical measures:
privacy.securityItem2: Access restrictions on servers and databases
privacy.cookiesText: SlopeSafe uses local storage for session management and your preferences. We do not use tracking cookies.
privacy.profilingText: No automated decision-making or profiling takes place. SlopeSafe does not create user profiles and does not use tracking.
privacy.rightsText: You have the following rights regarding your data:
privacy.rightsItem1: Right to access your stored data
privacy.rightsItem2: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
privacy.rightsItem3: Right to deletion of your data
privacy.rightsItem5: Right to withdraw your consent (e.g. location, push notifications)
privacy.rightsItem6: Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority
privacy.contactText: For questions about data protection, contact us at:

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.disclaimerText: SlopeSafe provides avalanche danger information for informational purposes only. The displayed data does not replace personal assessment of avalanche danger on site, avalanche safety training, or professional advice and tour planning.
imprint.disclaimerText2: Use of the information is at your own risk. SlopeSafe assumes no liability for the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the information provided, nor for any damages arising from the use or non-use of this information.
imprint.liabilityText: Our website contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no influence. The respective provider is always responsible for the content of linked pages.
imprint.copyrightText: The content and works on this website are subject to Swiss copyright law. Reproduction, editing, or distribution beyond the limits of copyright law requires the written consent of the operator.
imprint.dataSourcesText: SlopeSafe obtains data from the following sources:
imprint.dataSourceWeather: Weather forecasts and current weather data

about.subtitle: Real-time avalanche danger levels for Swiss ski resorts – on web and mobile.
about.whatText: SlopeSafe is the comprehensive platform for current avalanche danger levels in Switzerland. Whether on the slopes, planning a tour, or as an information source for ski resorts – SlopeSafe provides reliable data from the WSL Institute for Snow and Avalanche Research SLF, supplemented with weather forecasts and historical trends.
about.feature1Text: Current danger levels (1–5) for all Swiss ski resorts, including avalanche problems and affected aspects.
about.feature2Text: Clear map with all ski resorts and color-coded danger zones across the Swiss Alps.
about.feature3Text: Integrated weather forecasts with snow depth, wind, and visibility for each ski resort.
about.feature4Text: Available as a website and as a mobile app for iOS and Android – avalanche data anytime, anywhere.
about.dataText: SlopeSafe obtains its data exclusively from official and trusted sources:
about.dataSLF: Avalanche bulletins, danger levels, and avalanche problems
about.freeText: SlopeSafe is completely free. All features – danger levels, map, weather, and historical data – are available without any restrictions. Create an account to save your favorite ski resorts and receive push notifications when danger levels change.
about.ctaText: Check the current avalanche situation for your ski resort now.
